name: Institut d'encouragement de la recherche scientifique et de l'innovation de Bruxelles
memberOrga: non applicable because Innoviris is an official public body
goal: Innoviris is the Brussels Institute for the encouragement of scientific research and innovation. Our mission is to support and stimulate research, development and innovation in and for Brussels through the funding of innovative projects by companies, research organisations and the non-commercial sector.
interests: Competition, Enterprise, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Innoviris is active on the European scene by providing funding and guidance for programmes such as EUREKA, Ambient Assisted Living (AAL), ERA-NETs and Electronic Components and Systems for European Leadership (ECSEL). Innoviris also took part in the programming of the Cohesion funds for the period 2014-2020 (ERDF). Our organisation also provides financial support to the National Contact Points (e.g.  experts appointed by the national or regional authorities, and officially recognised by the European Commission), which are centralised at the Brussels Agency for Enterprises. The National Contact Point provides us in turn with information regarding the Belgian participation in H2020 projects.
